detectors.description: Variable Ownable._owner (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/GaussCash.sol#59) is not in mixedCase
GaussCash.MAX_UINT256 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/GaussCash.sol#105) is never used in GaussCash (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/GaussCash.sol#89-192)

owner() should be declared external:
	- Ownable.owner() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/GaussCash.sol#68-70)

renounceOwnership() should be declared external:
	- Ownable.renounceOwnership() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/GaussCash.sol#77-80)

transferOwnership(address) should be declared external:
	- Ownable.transferOwnership(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/GaussCash.sol#82-86)

balanceOf(address) should be declared external:
	- GaussCash.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/GaussCash.sol#118-124)

transfer(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- GaussCash.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/GaussCash.sol#126-135)

allowance(address,address) should be declared external:
	- GaussCash.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/GaussCash.sol#137-143)

approve(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- GaussCash.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/GaussCash.sol#158-165)
